title: Metrobank Account Information Form & Enrollment to Electronic Platforms (with SSI)

fields.label: Trust/IMA Account No.
fields.summary: Write account number as assigned by Metrobank.

fields.label: Account Name
fields.summary: Write full account name.

fields.label: Date
fields.summary: Write MM/DD/YYYY.

fields.label: Type of Account
fields.summary: Tick: • Trust Account • Investment Management Account (IMA).

fields.label: Degree of Account Discretion
fields.summary: Tick: • Discretionary • Directional. (Submit Annex B if changing from Discretionary to Directional.)

fields.label: Designated Settlement Account (DSA)
fields.summary: Write DSA account number. All withdrawals/contributions will go through this unless instructed otherwise.

fields.label: Primary Client Name
fields.summary: Write client name, risk score, and risk profile.

fields.label: Other Co-trustors/Principals
fields.summary: List each client with Score and Profile.

fields.label: Assessment Agreement
fields.summary: Tick one: • Accept assessment • Do not agree and request re-classification (acknowledge higher risk).

sections.title: Business Model & Asset Classification (Directional Accounts only)

fields.label: Capital Preservation
fields.summary: Tick: • Hold to Collect (Amortized Cost) • Hold to Collect and Sell (FVOCI) • Other (specify).

fields.label: Capital Growth/Trading
fields.summary: Tick: • Hold to Realize Cash Flows (FVTPL) • Other (specify).

fields.label: Income
fields.summary: Tick: • Hold to Collect (Amortized Cost) • Hold to Collect and Sell (FVOCI) • Other (specify).

fields.label: Total Return
fields.summary: Tick: • Managed/Fair Value basis (FVTPL) • Hold to Collect and Sell (FVOCI) • Other (specify).

fields.label: Client Type
fields.summary: Tick: • Individual (write email & mobile) • Corporate (submit Secretary’s Certificate).

fields.label: Registered Contact Information
fields.summary: List encrypted email address(es) and mobile number(s).

fields.label: Authorized Users
fields.summary: List names, office phone/mobile, office encrypted email, authorized transaction type and amount limit. Tick which apply: Send Instructions • Approve/Confirm Instructions.

fields.label: Designated Recipient(s)
fields.summary: List names and contact details of recipients for Financial Statements, Confirmations, Reports.

fields.label: Accuracy of Contact Info
fields.summary: Certify registered contact info is correct, protected, and accessible only to client/authorized users.

fields.label: Electronic Instructions Binding
fields.summary: Acknowledge instructions are valid and binding even without original signature; originals may still be required.

fields.label: Data Privacy Consent
fields.summary: Consent to Metrobank’s use of personal data for processing, verification, regulatory purposes, per Data Privacy Act and Metrobank policy.

fields.label: Customer Signatures
fields.summary: Customer(s) sign over printed name and date.

fields.label: Bank Use Only
fields.summary: Signed by Account Manager and Supervising Officer.

fields.label: Access & Security
fields.summary: Only account owner/authorized reps may access MOSE; safeguard PIN and reference codes.

fields.label: Approvals via MOSE
fields.summary: Approvals/rejections are binding, equivalent to written signatures.

fields.label: Termination/Changes
fields.summary: Notify MBTC-TBG in writing to opt-out or update Registered Contact Info.

fields.label: Data Processing
fields.summary: Consent to Metrobank’s processing of data for MOSE transactions.

sections.title: Annex B — Change Degree of Discretion (Discretionary → Directional)

fields.label: Instruction Letter
fields.summary: Submit signed LOI with account name/number, type, and effective date.

fields.label: Fee Acknowledgment
fields.summary: Acknowledge fee basis and frequency for directional accounts.

fields.label: Income Payment Instruction
fields.summary: Tick: • Credit to DSA (Metrobank only) • Retain in account for reinvestment.

fields.label: Maturity Proceeds Instruction
fields.summary: Tick: • Credit to DSA (Metrobank only) • Retain in account for reinvestment.

fields.label: Customer Signatures
fields.summary: Sign over printed name(s) and date.

sections.title: Annex C — Standard Settlement Instruction (Corporate Accounts)

fields.label: SSI Effective Date
fields.summary: Write date of SSI.

fields.label: Client Name & TBG Account No.
fields.summary: Write account details.

fields.label: Settlement Instructions
fields.summary: State that all withdrawals/credits go through the Designated Settlement Account. If Other Bank Accounts or Branch Accounts are allowed, list bank name, SWIFT, account number, account name, currency.

fields.label: Authorized Signatories
fields.summary: Names and signatures as per Secretary’s Certificate.
